Articles.Content:
The KSC needs *you* to assist in removing debris from the ocean! We may be able to boil away the ocean if we had enough time and Sunbeam lasers, but loiter time is the enemy!

The obvious answer is a vehicle that can travel on land and propel itself through water at a reasonable speed, while carrying a laser system to the target.

**Goal:** Build an amphibious vehicle that can travel on land and on water safely, while being able to travel no less than 15 km from the shore!

**Requirements:**

- At least one Sunbeam laser system, to be used to eliminate floating debris on site. You must be able to operate the laser without many obstructions [rotating the vehicle is allowed!].

- Land and water travel. How you solve this is up to you!

- Range of 15 km or more!

**Restrictions:** No Gravitsapas or other 'cheat' parts. All entries will be judged as they come. Usage of any mod pack is allowed, as long as it\'s balanced well!

**This is possible! I have a prototype ship that is able to drive somewhat safely on land and float in the water -- moving through the water is another thing entirely.**
I\'ll maybe give a go at it. Must the craft be able to go back on land after splashdown ?

Challenge accepted! This was fun ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) I\'m sure it could reach 15km from shore if I had the patience to try...
